scripts.build: npm run remove-dist && npm run compile && npm run copy-views
scripts.start:development: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DOTENV_FLOW_PATH=./environments npx pm2 start -n %PROJECT dist/index.js --node-args="-r dotenv-flow/config"
scripts.start:staging: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging DOTENV_FLOW_PATH=./environments npx pm2 start -n %PROJECT dist/index.js --node-args="-r dotenv-flow/config"
scripts.start:production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production DOTENV_FLOW_PATH=./environments npx pm2 start -n %PROJECT dist/index.js --node-args="-r dotenv-flow/config"
scripts.seed:development: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DOTENV_FLOW_PATH=./environments node -r dotenv-flow/config bin/execute-seeders.js
scripts.seed:staging: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging DOTENV_FLOW_PATH=./environments node -r dotenv-flow/config bin/execute-seeders.js
scripts.seed:production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production DOTENV_FLOW_PATH=./environments node -r dotenv-flow/config bin/execute-seeders.js
